bugs.summary: Move some methods/nested classes of `EditorBase` to `HTMLEditor`
Add a test that exercises restoring scroll/form data for oop frames on back/forward
Register() should not create a garbage register, but an invalid register
[Ubuntu] Changing to dark theme mode makes the customization footer buttons visible only after mouse hover
[Ubuntu] Customization footer buttons appear only after 1-2 seconds when switching from Dark to Alpenglow theme
Enable some more clang warning flags and remove some unnecessary warning flags
In nsDocumentViewer::SetDocument, call Document::Destroy if the new document is a static document.
